Articles.Content:
So, I'm wondering ... are there plans on being able to move around in IVA?

Having tubes, modules and stuff... this is not a direct suggestion, just a thought.

So, I'm wondering ... are there plans on being able to move around in IVA?

As far as I know, it is planned.

Having tubes, modules and stuff...

Great. Now I'm picturing the Kerbal's space stations as giant hamster habitats.

Great. Now I'm picturing the Kerbal's space stations as giant hamster habitats.

Yeah. When they mantioned us being able to stick them anywhere for the up coming update. I thought the same thing too.
I see ppl making mazes and challenging you to find your way out. I hate mazes btw

Great. Now I'm picturing the Kerbal's space stations as giant hamster habitats.

is still Laughing for this
